extracted_playbook.title: Contact New Rock Technologies Support
extracted_playbook.description: Reach out to New Rock Technologies customer support for additional information regarding the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all control system devices and/or systems are not accessible from the internet to minimize network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Place control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of Industrial Control Systems (ICS) assets. Refer to CISA's ICS webpage for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

cve_id: New Rock Technologies Cloud Connected Devices Vulnerabilities
